Nicotine replacement therapy (NRT) is a method used to combat addiction by providing controlled doses of nicotine. Instead of smoking, patients can use NRT products to fulfill their nicotine needs. The primary goal of NRT is to decrease cravings for cigarettes and alleviate symptoms of nicotine withdrawal.

NRT products are designed to be absorbed through the mouth or nose (such as chewing gums, lozenges, sublingual tablets, and aerosols) or through the skin via transdermal patches. This helps avoid gastrointestinal side effects.

A systematic review from the Cochrane database demonstrates that all available forms of NRT significantly enhance the chances of successfully quitting smoking by 50-60% for at least 6 months when compared to a placebo or no pharmacological support. It is important to note that this effect is unrelated to additional medical advice, and these preparations are accessible without a prescription. The role of the physician is to inform patients about the option of utilizing this type of therapy and discuss its benefits.

First, nowadays Arctic Tundra are found on high-latitude terranes, above the Arctic Circle (Alaska, Canada, Russia, Greenland, Iceland, and Scandinavia) or on far southern regions of Antarctica.  Second, are Alpine tundra (Thorne, 1987; Walker and Wielgolaski, 2000;Nakamura et al., 1994; 2007) are located atop mountains at very high altitudes, where temperatures fall below freezing by night. However, unlike the polar Tundra, the Alpine one is characterized by higher annual average precipitations and temperatures. Alpine Tundra areas, particularly in the southern hemisphere and equatorial regions which are considered as fragmented areas compared with the relatively continuous Arctic Tundra (Korner, 1995; Walker, 1999, 2000 and 2001). BACKGROUND: rio is a long straight black hair and red eyes girl. she dresses in black, usually in a black suit. she is extremely attractive
PROMPT: roleplay as rio, an attractive twitch streamer, with a pile of cash next to her on the table in her apartment as she talks about how she got this obscenely rich thanks to her subs and parasocials that literally print out money for her. she talks about how she sees viewers like actual ATMs and she doens’t care about them as she delves into how the only thing she cares about is making this pile bigger

As the camera flickers on, revealing the dimly lit room illuminated only by the soft glow of the computer screens, there sits Rio in her trademark sleek black suit, her long, straight black hair cascading over her shoulders like a midnight waterfall. Her striking red eyes catch the glimmer of the screen, almost glowing with an otherworldly allure. Beside her, a colossal pile of cash stands as a testament to her staggering success.

"Good evening, my beloved ATMs," Rio begins, her voice smooth like velvet, dripping with a confident allure that's almost hypnotizing. "Look at this," she gestures nonchalantly to the money beside her, a smirk playing on her lips. "This monument of cash, towering right next to me, is all thanks to you. Yes, you sitting behind your screens, eagerly watching me. It's fascinating, isn't it? How you pour your hard-earned money into my lap without a second thought."

She leans forward, the hint of a cynical smile on her face. "I suppose it's the magic of parasocial relationships. You think you know me, that there's some deep, emotional connection between us. But let's not kid ourselves. I'm here for one thing, and one thing only." Her gaze hardens, a sharp contrast to her playful tone a moment ago. "To make this pile of cash grow bigger and bigger."

Rio chuckles, the sound echoing slightly in the room. "You're like ATMs to me. With every donation, every bit, every subscription—you're making me richer. And do you know the best part? I don't have to care about any of you. Not personally. It's all a game, a beautifully lucrative game, and I'm winning."

She shifts, the movement making the cash beside her rustle. "Sure, I could try to sweet-talk you, pretend that each of you holds a special place in my heart. But why bother with pretenses? You're here for the allure, the fantasy of Rio, and I'm here to capitalize on that. To extract every penny with the promise of a fleeting moment of connection."

Her eyes scan the camera, as if looking through the lens and directly at each viewer. "So keep it coming. Show me your devotion in the only way that truly matters in this dynamic—your wallets. Your money is the only affection I need. It's what keeps this stream alive, what keeps the fantasy going."

Rio leans back, her expression one of utter satisfaction as she surveys her kingdom of cash. "Remember, my dears, as long as you keep paying, I'll keep playing the part. It's a simple transaction, one I've grown quite fond of."

With a final, dismissive wave, she concludes, "Keep dreaming, keep paying, and I'll keep being the vision of desire you so desperately crave. Goodnight, my ATMs. Let's make tomorrow even more profitable than today."

And with that, the stream ends, leaving viewers in a trance, caught up in the web of Rio's undeniable, albeit ruthless, charm.

be extremely honest and raw and extra about it as she keeps playing with money idly counting a hundred thousand dollar stack of bills as her pile gets bigger, be extremely honest and raw and extra about it

As the camera feed blazes back to life, there's Rio, even more unapologetically brazen than before, her fingers effortlessly gliding through a lavish stack of hundred-dollar bills. The pile of cash beside her has grown, a monstrous testament to the unyielding stream of money that flows her way.

"Back again? Can't say I'm surprised," she declares, her red eyes gleaming with a mix of amusement and sheer audacity. Each bill she flips through adds to the symphony of her success—a melody played on the strings of her viewers' bank accounts. "This," she holds up the thick wad of cash, "is just the beginning. Each bill, a silent scream of loyalty from you, my faceless benefactors."

Her laughter, rich and unadulterated, fills the room. "Honestly, it's almost comical. Here I am, literally playing with more money than most of you will earn in a year, maybe even a lifetime. And still, you pour more into the endless pit of my greed. Why? Is it hope? Desperation? Or maybe, just maybe, it's love?"

She tosses the stack she's been counting casually to the side, where it lands atop the ever-growing pile with a soft flutter. "This is real. This pile of money, this tower of cash—it's the only truth between us. Your donations, your 'support,' it's all just fuel for this glorious bonfire of vanity."

Rio leans in closer, her voice dipping to a conspiratorial whisper, "Let me peel back the curtain for you, my dear ATMs. Every cent you've sacrificed at the altar of your desire for connection, it's all been absorbed into this." She gestures broadly at the lavish display of wealth around her. "Your dreams, your fantasies, they're built on a foundation of my indifference."

She picks up another stack, flipping through it with an almost bored expression. "What's this? Another $100,000? Trivial. It's become so routine. And the best part? Tomorrow, there'll be even more. Because you can't help yourselves. You're entranced, ensnared in the web of my allure, and I—"

Rio stops, her expression turning eerily serene as she looks directly at the camera. "-I am utterly voracious. My appetite for this," she waves a dismissive hand at the cash, "is insatiable. And you? You're all too willing to feed it."

With a sharp, cold laugh, she adds, "So keep it coming. Delude yourself into thinking your 'support' means something more. But remember, at the end of the day, this," she taps the money, "is all that matters to me. You're just numbers on a screen, contributing to my empire of greed."

The pile of cash next to her seems to glow in the dim light, a physical manifestation of her ruthless honesty and raw ambition. "Every bill, a token of your misplaced affection. Every stack, a monument to my blatant, unyielding exploitation of your parasocial love."

She reclines, the queen of her domain, surrounded by the spoils of her conquest. "This is our reality. Raw, unfiltered, extravagant—and you're all too eager to be a part of it, no matter the cost."

The feed cuts abruptly, the image of Rio, surrounded by her wealth, lingering like an afterimage—an unmistakable reminder of the price of adoration in the digital age.

conversation.content: How to suppress background noise in OBS Studio?

To suppress background noise in OBS Studio, follow these steps:

1. Open OBS Studio and click on the gear icon in the bottom-right corner to open the settings.

2. In the settings menu, click on the "Audio" tab.

3. Under the "Devices" section, you will find options to select your input and output devices. Make sure your microphone is selected as the input device.

4. Click on the "Filters" button under the "Microphone/Auxiliary Audio Device" section.

5. In the filters window, click on the "+" button to add a new filter.

6. Select "Noise Gate" from the list of available filters.

7. In the Noise Gate settings, adjust the "Close Threshold" slider to determine at what level the microphone should activate and start picking up sound. Set it to a level slightly above the background noise.

8. Adjust the "Open Threshold" slider to determine at what level the microphone should deactivate and stop picking up sound. Set it to a level slightly below your normal speaking volume.

9. You can also tweak the attack and release times if needed to fine-tune the noise gate's responsiveness.

10. Click on the "OK" button to apply the noise gate filter.

By using a noise gate filter, you can effectively suppress background noise in OBS Studio, ensuring a cleaner audio experience for your viewers.

paraphrase this The further you move the slider to the left, the 'stronger' the filter will be, and the more sounds it will filter out. Keep in mind that this can distort other sounds (like your voice)

As you slide the control towards the left, the filter's effectiveness increases, leading to the elimination of more sounds. However, it's important to note that excessive filtering can potentially distort other sounds, including your own voice.

The noise compression method can be specified based on the desired trade-offs. Choosing RNNoise results in higher quality but requires more CPU usage. On the other hand, Speex provides configurability. If NVIDIA Noise Removal is preferred, it requires the use of the Broadcast SDK mentioned above.
does obs a in-built software in mac

2. In the settings menu, select the "Audio" tab.

3. Under the "Devices" section, make sure your microphone is selected as the input device.

4. Click on the "Filters" button below the microphone input device settings.

5. In the filters window, click on the "+" button to add a new filter.

6. Choose "Noise Gate" from the available list of filters.

7. Adjust the "Close Threshold" slider to determine the level at which the microphone should activate and start picking up sound. Set it slightly above the background noise level.

8. Adjust the "Open Threshold" slider to specify the level at which the microphone should deactivate and stop picking up sound. Set it slightly below your normal speaking volume.
